PHRASE.LANG: Nothing screams "Aquarium Meister" like this tank! You'll be the envy of your friends with your brand new 480 gallon tank complete with 10 fish, 3 decorations and a floor that can't be beat. This fella will hold 40 small, medium or LARGE fish and 20 small, medium or LARGE decorations. You better get a table with reinforced legs to hold this one up.
